constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 79 (Friday, May 7, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. PANETTA:
H.R. 3062.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, clause 18
[Page H2153]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

title: To establish an exemption from a limitation on the use of certain airport funds for safety projects at a nonhub airport or small hub airport, and for other purposes.
